fields.name: ||Stats||
fields.value: ||+20 Max Health, +30% Speed, +20% Might, -80% Greed, +10% Curse, -110% Projectile Speed||

fields.name: ||Unlock||
fields.value:
||Eat a total of 100 floor chickens across all runs.
Play Mad Forest and grab the Pummarola and Skull O'Maniac pickups on the map.
Pies should start spawning at a fixed offset from your position, but only if you have eaten the 100 chickens total.
Following them should lead you to the boss akin to a breadcrumb trail.
A dark tinted mage boss spawns to the northwest of the Skull pickup.
Kill it to unlock the new secret character.
The boss does not teleport after you (also similar to Leda) but will walk towards you even if you are far away.
It is immune to instant-kills and freezing so make sure you have decent damage output.||
